title: CoinDesk (@CoinDesk)
body:
.@yugalabs' new CEO @dalegre joins us at #Consensus2023 to discuss his transition from @Activision to the world of Web3 gaming.

Join us and hear his thoughts on how he plans to take the studio behind @BoredApeYC to the next level. 
https://consensus.coindesk.com/agenda/event/-aping-into-web3-gaming-with-yuga-labs-aping-into-web3-gaming-with-yuga-labs-49?term=organic&utm_campaign=CoinDesk&utm_content=Speakers%2Cagenda%2Cmarketing%2Cc23%2CFunday&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter https://t.co/xITVXSOmEY
